abstract: The general counsel, Anastasia D. Kelly, notified the company that she planned to exercise her rights to severance, according to people who know her professionally.
snippet: The general counsel, Anastasia D. Kelly, notified the company that she planned to exercise her rights to severance, according to people who know her professionally.
lead_paragraph: Tough negotiations with the government over how to compensate top executives of the American International Group have ended with the likely departure of the company’s general counsel, according to people close to the talks.

headline.main: A.I.G. General Counsel Is Set to Depart Amid Talks on Pay
headline.print_headline: A.I.G. General Counsel Is Set to Depart Amid Talks on Pay

byline.original: By Mary Williams Walsh and Louise Story

abstract: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation resisted pressure from the administration of President George W. Bush to extend assistance to Bank of America to complete its purchase of Merrill Lynch but was ultimately convinced of the need, its chairman, Sheila Bair, said on Friday.
snippet: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation resisted pressure from the administration of President George W. Bush to extend assistance to Bank of America to complete its purchase of Merrill Lynch but was ultimately convinced of the need, its chairma...
lead_paragraph: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation resisted pressure from the Bush administration to extend assistance to Bank of America to complete its purchase of Merrill Lynch, but was ultimately convinced of the need, the agency’s chairwoman, Sheila C. Bair, said on Friday.

headline.main: Bair Says F.D.I.C. Questioned BofA Assistance
